description.en: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the ninth Lunar Year. The ninth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Monkey.
description.ar: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the ninth Lunar Year. The ninth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Monkey.
description.br: Uma capa lindamente trabalhada e adornada com um símbolo que representa o nono Ano Lunar. O nono ano lunar é dedicado ao Macaco.
description.cns: 一件做工精美的披风。披风的图案展示的是第九地支申，该年的生肖为猴。
description.de: Trägt das Symbol zum Jahr des Affen aus dem chinesischen Tierkreiszeichen. Erhöht alle Statuswerte um zwei.
description.fi: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the ninth Lunar Year. The ninth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Monkey.
description.fil: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the ninth Lunar Year. The ninth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Monkey.
description.fr: Une cape magnifiquement confectionnée, ornée d'un symbole qui représente la neuvième Année Lunaire. La neuvième Année Lunaire est dédiée au Singe.
description.id: Jubah yang dibuat dengan indah dan dihiasi dengan simbol yang mewakili Lunar Year kesembilan. Lunar Year kesembilan ini didedikasikan untuk Monyet.
description.it: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the ninth Lunar Year. The ninth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Monkey.
description.jp: 9番目の月の年を表すシンボルで飾られた美しく細工されたマント。9番目の旧正月は猿に捧げられます。
description.kr: 음력 9 년을 상징하는 상징이 새겨진 아름답게 제작 된 망토입니다. 음력 9 년은 원숭이에게 바쳐집니다.
description.nl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the ninth Lunar Year. The ninth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Monkey.
description.pl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the ninth Lunar Year. The ninth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Monkey.
description.ru: Красивый плащ с символом девятого года китайского календаря - обезьяной.
description.sp: Una capa bellamente elaborada adornada con un símbolo que representa el noveno Año Lunar. El noveno Año Lunar está dedicado al Mono.
description.sw: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the ninth Lunar Year. The ninth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Monkey.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมที่ประดิษฐ์ขึ้นอย่างสวยงามประดับด้วยสัญลักษณ์ที่แสดงถึงปีจันทรคติที่เก้า ปีจันทรคติที่เก้าอุทิศให้กับลิง
description.tw: 象徵著農曆生肖猴年的斗篷
description.vi: Một chiếc áo choàng được làm thủ công đẹp mắt với biểu tượng tượng trưng cho Tết Nguyên đán thứ chín. Mùng 9 Tết dành riêng cho Bính Thân.
